channel.title: Kmers on BioJulia
channel.description: Recent content in Kmers on BioJulia

item.title: BioSequences
item.description: Description BioSequences provides data types and methods for common operations with biological sequences, including DNA, RNA, and amino acid sequences. Features include: DNA, RNA, and Amino Acid sequence types. Kmer and Skipmer sequence types. Methods for sequence transformations. Methods for motif searching. Mismatch and gc counting.
